mapper.select: SELECT sbrs.barcode_rule_spec_id, sbrs.barcode_rule_id, sbrs.spec_id, sbrs.specification, sbrs.barcode_length, sbrs.initial_value, sbrs.step, sbrs.fill_operator, sbrs.fill_direction, sbrs.customize_name, sbrs.customize_value, sbrs.intercept_length, sbrs.intercept_position, sbrs.intercept_direction, sbrs.organization_id, sbrs.remark FROM smt_barcode_rule_spec AS sbrs LEFT JOIN smt_barcode_rule sbr ON sbr.barcode_rule_id = sbrs.barcode_rule_id LEFT JOIN smt_package_specification sps ON sps.package_specification_id = #{packageSpecificationId} WHERE sbr.barcode_rule_id = sps.barcode_rule_id
SELECT sum( mpm.print_barcode_count ) FROM mes_package_manager mpm
